item.title: COVID-19 Relief
item.description: COVID-19 Campaign Muthuram, Founder Trustee of Suyam created this Campaign to support families/people/children who are affected due to COVID-19 lock down and it’s direct and indirect challenges.

item.title: Siragu Montessori School
item.description: Siragu Montessori This school was established in 2003 to give FREE EDUCATION to the most underprivileged Children.

item.title: Sponsor a Meal
item.description: Sponsor a Meal Sponsor A Meal campagin initiated by Suyam through its Founder Trustee, Muthuram, with an aim to raise contributions by special feeding programs to feed the residential children and deserving day scholars of Siragu Montessori School and Bharathamatha School.

item.title: Sponsor a Teacher at Siragu
item.description: Sponsor a Teacher at Siragu eacher plays a vital role in every school.

item.title: Sponsor a Teacher at Siragu
item.description: Sponsor our Diwali Suyam registered under Trust Act in the year 1999 (non formally since 1987) and also registered with FCRA Act, Also registered with Benevity Causes, USA and CAF America.

item.title: Sponsor our Bharathamatha school
item.description: Sponsor our Bharathamatha School harathamatha Nursery & Primary School situated in Vyasarpadi, owned & managed by Suyam.
